scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin aboutme.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutme.html && usemin emailsocial.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/emailsocial.html && usemin home.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/home.html && usemin web.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/web.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
